A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: All the things that had me looking forward to having unveiled from The Force Awakens for the last 2 years was disguarded. I left unsatisfied. This continues to move away from the Star Wars universe I loved and morphs into something different. I wouldn't have issue with that if this didn't act like it was continuing the story of the originals. We see the actors and props we saw 30 years ago\, but I wonder if they are playing the same characters or just some parallel galaxy.
